question: The birth anniversary of which National leader is being observed as Rashtriya Ekta Diwas?
explanation:
October 31 2020 marks the 145th birth anniversary of Sardar Patel. It would be observed as the Rashtriya Ekta Diwas.
The Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi will visit Kevadia in Gujarat to pay homage to the leader at the Statue of Unity. He would also administer the Rashtriya Ekta Pledge during the event.
